name: WRAITH
size_type_alignment: Medium or Small Undead, Neutral Evil

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.text: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the wraith has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

actions.name: Create Specter
actions.text: The wraith targets a Humanoid corpse within 10 feet of itself that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute. The target's spirit rises as a

actions.name: Specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space
actions.text: The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at a time.
